title: Ticket #6920: Local universe jobs can't submit to schedd because MOUNT_UNDER_SCRATCH
description:
LIGO reports that after upgrade to 8.8, their local universe jobs can't submit to the schedd. This is because in 8.8 we made MOUNT_UNDER_SCRATCH default to /tmp, /var/tmp, and filesystem authentication requires a shared /tmp between the condor_submit binary and the schedd.

To fix this, we will disable MOUNT_UNDER_SCRATCH for local universe jobs. Seems like there may be other cases where local universe jobs may want to share files in /tmp with the outside world.
